mapper.select: select * from board order by ref desc, step asc limit #{startNum2}, #{count}
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, logtime=now() where seq=${seq}
update board set step=step+1 where ref=${ref} and step>${step}
update board set reply=reply+1 where seq=#{pseq}
update board set reply=reply-1 where seq=#{pseq}
update board set subject = concat('[원글이 삭제된 답글]', subject) where pseq=#{seq}
